short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See Jeffrey the Camel on your New Tab page. And a bunch of other animals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Camel New Tab is a revolutionary Chrome new tab extension that will change the way you think about browsing the internet. Instead of a regular new tab page, experience a vivid, bold new tab page with engaging backgrounds, helpful links, a Bible verse of the day, games, and most importantly, YOU CAN SEE A CAMEL PICTURE!!!!
